channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Obstruction caused by Plastic barriers, 24th January
item.description:
Plastic barriers were placed outside number 40 in early December for pavement repairs. The repairs were done on about 28th December and the barriers have been left blocking the pavement .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, The Crescent, Park Langley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Untaxed/ SORN vehicle stored on trailer for long period, 24th January
item.description:
The vehicle on the trailer has no MOT (long expired) and is declared as SORN. It is illegal to store an untaxed/ SORN vehicle on a trailer parked on the public highway.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plaistow Lane, Plaistow, Greater London
